name: Alphabet DOP: Delete Puzzle
description:
Are you a fan of "Alphabet” and “Rainbow Friends”? Do you want to discover interesting stories with these characters?

Let us introduce you to the Alphabet DOP: Delete Puzzle game. In the game, you will use your intelligence to solve puzzles and help L, B, A,... escape the hunt of F and O. There are also several interesting Alphabet and Rainbow Friends quizzes.

Little F is dangerous and scary, yet he is a kind person at heart. What makes F so cruel and brutal?
